attributes.action: Anyone that makes a false report or allegation to police should be facing jail
attributes.additional_details: Make it a criminal offence to make false reports or allegations - they should have garuanteed prison time
attributes.background: Make it a criminal offence to make false reports or allegations - they should have garuanteed prison time

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions when the request is something that's already happening.

It's already illegal to give false allegations to the police.
